alert.note: Alert for Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 9:32AM CDT until April 05 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Northern Perry County in southeastern Mississippi... Southern Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... Northern Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 931 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Chatom to 10 miles east of Richton to 4 miles west of New Augusta, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Richton, New Augusta, State Line and Fruitdale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
